itunes:title: Lent 2020 Week 3 with Jessica Lamb
title: Lent 2020 Week 3 with Jessica Lamb
description:
We're in week three of our 2020 Lent reading plan, and Raechel and Amanda are joined by She Reads Truth's managing editor and fellow lover of God's Word, Jessica “Strong Feelings” Lamb. Together they explore the heart of God in the Prophets, the joy of pencil sharpeners, and the difficult calling of Jeremiah.

Read with Us: 

This episode corresponds to Week 3 of the She Reads Truth Lent reading plan found on the She Reads Truth app and SheReadsTruth.com. 

Shop the Lent collection at ShopSheReadsTruth.com 

Save 15% on your first She Reads Truth Subscription Box when you use the code BOX15.

Show notes can be found at shereadstruth.com/podcast/lent-2020-week-3-with-jessica-lamb/
